title: Construction of a pillar[5]arene-based supramolecular chiral polymer linked to aminophosphine salt for chiral recognition of enantiomers of mandelic acid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16278-16283
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01386G, Paper

Chong Lin, Yang Shen, Xiaojun Guo, Wengui Duan, Yan Huang, Guobao Huang, Luzhi Liu
One novel pillar[5]arene-based supramolecular chiral polymer L-TPP-P has been synthesized. L-TPP-P has stable supramolecular chiral properties and could be used as a chiral solvation reagent for chiral recognition of mandelic acid MA.
